smells.description: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

instances.message: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'ActivityBuilder' with '13' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses around the lambda ({ hill -> repository.markHillNotClimbed(hill.hill.h_id) }) are unnecessary and can be removed.
Parentheses around the lambda ({ pv -> repository.markHillNotClimbed(pv.second.hill.h_id) }) are unnecessary and can be removed.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.
This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.
This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.
This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.
This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: uk.colessoft.android.hilllist.dao.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
uk.colessoft.android.hilllist.ui.activity.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
uk.colessoft.android.hilllist.ui.fragment.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
uk.colessoft.android.hilllist.di.module.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: UnnecessaryAbstractClass
smells.description: An abstract class is unnecessary and can be refactored. An abstract class should have both abstract and concrete properties or functions. An abstract class without a concrete member can be refactored to an interface. An abstract class without an abstract member can be refactored to a concrete class.

instances.message: An abstract class without a concrete member can be refactored to an interface.
An abstract class without a concrete member can be refactored to an interface.

smells.name: ReturnCount
smells.description: Restrict the number of return statements in methods.

instances.message: Function whereClause has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.

smells.name: UseDataClass
smells.description: Classes that do nothing but hold data should be replaced with a data class.

instances.message: The class GeographImageDetail defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
